original_title: アナウンサーレ×プ事件権力と肉欲に最後まで抵抗したプライド 河南実里
overview: Minori was a popular station announcer. With her strong desire to improve, she turned into a freelancer. However, when she got the MC at the old TV station, her adultery photo was taken... That free announcer Minori Kanami suffered from crying, screaming, and body attacking hard rep work! Must see!
title: Announcer Sex Crime The Pride That Resisted Power And Lust Until The Very End Minori Kawana - Minori Kawana
